name: Lost and Found (CurlyJ)
description: Rob Lemb-Suliver wakes up in a motel. A new case has been handed to him. After the loss of their Lighthouse grounds keeper, the town of Waredaygough has called Rob in to help bring light to the mystery. The mayor, Kay Pitogether, has put Rob up in the local Motel for the whole of the case. What could have become of the groundskeeper, Nate Lumin?
